Projects.title: Patient Campaign (Healthcare)
desc: The Patient Campaign Project is a web-based application designed to enhance patient engagement through personalized campaigns. By prioritizing patient engagement, the system ensures better health outcomes and increased revenue streams, creating a win-win situation for both healthcare providers and patients

Projects.title: Assess Right AI (Healthcare)
desc: The Assess Right AI is a web-based solution designed for healthcare facilities to efficiently manage patient data, generate comprehensive medical reports, and optimise administrative operations. The system allows a Super Admin to manage facilities, while each facility can register new patients and upload their medical reports. The platform automatically generates a list of Non-Therapeutic Ancillaries (NTA) components, Medication, and Nursing Components based on patient reports.

Projects.title: PwC Official Project
desc: PwC is a multinational professional services network, providing industry-focused assurance, advisory, and tax services to various sectors.
